stories.text:
Google added a new eligibility requirement to apply for the Google for Startups Cloud Program[0] : "Your startup has received verifiable pre-seed to Series A equity funding, and if Series A, raised within 1 year of applying to the program.", which is a real shame for bootstrapped startups wanting to use GCP.

[0] https://inthecloud.withgoogle.com/startup/dl-cd.html
stories.title: Google for Startups Cloud Program now only for funded startups

stories.text: I run a gopher server, MQTT Broker and a web server. Recently, I managed to merge the gopher and web site so that if you're unlucky enough not to have a gopher client handy you can view the whole file tree via the web site. I add a few new files daily and this is reported on a "latest files" page. However, I'm interested in making new file info available via MQTT: would anyone here be interested in this type of facility?
stories.title: Ask HN: Anyone interested in getting new file notifications via MQTT?
